titleStmt.title: A declaration and proclamation of the Deputy-General of Ireland, concerning the present hand of God in the visitation of the plague; and for the exercise of fasting and prayer in relation thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1650 : Ireton)
Ireton, Henry, 1611-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Cork in the Year of our Lord, 1650. Reprinted at London by John Field,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Cork in the Year of our Lord
